Description: Black granite shabti of Amenhotep with a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face, a collar and crossed hands in relief; the front of the leg section is inscribed with Chapter 6 of the Book of the Dead in seven rows of Hieroglyphic text; the head and shoulder section and part of the lappet-wig have become separated from the body and the foot section is lost.
Condition: broken into three fragments; partly restored
